story.kicker_image_caption: Frida Kahlo with husband Diego Rivera. Source: Nickolas Muray photography
story.storykicker: This home video of Frida Kahlo with husband Diego Rivera will melt your heart.
story.storybody:
"I don't want anything to hurt him, nothing to bother him and rob him of the energy he needs for to live..."

These were the words of artist Frida Kahlo for her husband, Diego Rivera. Through their tumultuous marriage, extramarital affairs, divorce and then remarriage, the two extraordinary painters found their own kind of extraordinary love.

While their relationship was not of the conventional sort, their love story is one that the world remembers. After Kahlo's death, Rivera even wrote that he had realised it too late that the most wonderful part of his life had been his love for her.

Here is a rare home video that takes a peek into the love story of Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera's:
